author: quorneng
title: Looks good but.....
review:
The Formula Flash is quite a big model with a V6 engine driven through a rear differential and a set of quite realistic looking exhaust pipes. The double wishbone suspension really looks the part but unfortunately it is rigid and does not move. The steering is very direct, even for a racing car. Additional features include radiators in the side pods and rear view mirrors for the driver and the wheels, tyres and stickers set the car off nicely.
Overall a satifying build and quite good looking within the limitation of a conventional stud building but it is a pity about the lack of suspension.
